supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-15 (in mm), (1) 45 x 47, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, right margin, (2) 54 x 35, (A) 8 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (3) 56 x 14, (A) 5 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (4) 62 x 62, (A) 4 lines, top margin (?), (B) blank, (5) 42 x 47, (A) 1 lines, margins (?), (B) blank, (6) 22 x 10, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (7) 48 x 31, (A) 3 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (8) 46 x 30, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, right margin, (9) 36 x 20, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (10) 34 x 42, (A) 3 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (11) 101 x 45, (A) 14 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (12) 60 x 21, (A) 9 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (13) 54 x 11, (A) 7 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (14) 62 x 64, (A) 9 lines, right margin, (B) blank, (15) 64 x 40, (A) 8 lines, top (?) bottom (?) margins, (B) blank
